general.creator: Created By
general.less-zero-tip: Values less than 0 indicate no limit
general.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
general.clear_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear the data?
general.name: Name

facade.asset_placeholder: Asset name, protocol, labels, network address

delete_confirm.title: Are you sure you want to delete this file?
delete_confirm.content: This operation will permanently delete the file. Are you sure?

editor.label: Editor
editor.unsaved_changes_content: Closing the editor will discard unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to close?

tunnel.closed: The tunnel connection has been closed.

confirm.title: Are you sure you want to reset the user's password?
confirm.content: If no password is entered, a random one will be generated and sent via email.

confirm.title: Are you sure you want to reset the user's two-factor authentication information?
confirm.content: After resetting, the user can log in without two-factor authentication.

department.weight_tooltip: The larger the number, the more forward it is sorted.
department.leaders_placeholder: Please select the person in charge

logs.label: Logs
logs.clear_confirm_content: Confirm to clear all logs? This operation cannot be undone.

tools.target_placeholder: Please enter the IP address or domain name.
tools.attempts_tips: Set the number of times the request is sent

sysops.spec_tooltip: Supports second-level scheduled tasks, different from standard cron expressions, the first field represents seconds (compatible with Quartz expression specifications), but does not support the year field.

disconnect.confirm: Are you sure you want to disconnect this session?

accessLog.title: Access Log
accessLog.clearConfirmContent: Are you sure you want to clear all access logs? This action cannot be undone.

table.pv: PV" stands for "PhotoVoltaic" in English, which refers to the technology used to convert sunlight directly into electricity. However, without context, it could also mean different things such as "Page View" in web analytics. If you need a specific context, please provide more details.

tabs.closeRight: Close the tab on the right

login.back: Go back to the previous step
login.wechat_work_error: Enterprise WeChat login failed, please retry

account.otp_bind_title: You have successfully enabled two-factor authentication
account.otp_bind_sub_title: Multi-factor authentication - secondary authentication - login identity verification, more secure access control.
account.otp_unbind_title: Are you sure you want to disable two-factor authentication?
account.otp_unbind_subtitle: Disabling it may expose your system account to brute-force attacks.
account.passkey_delete_title: Are you sure you want to remove your passkey?
account.passkey_delete_content: Passkeys provide better protection for your account and assets. It is recommended to keep them.
account.otp_required: You must enable two-factor authentication before continuing.
account.password_expired: Your password has expired, please change your password.
account.no_mfa_title: Please bind your security verification method first.
account.no_mfa_subtitle: You have not bound any security verification methods, and therefore cannot view sensitive data.
account.otp_description: Two-factor authentication (OTP) provides an extra layer of security for your account. Even if your password is compromised, an attacker cannot access your account without your mobile device.

otp_features.title: Function Features
otp_features.enhanced_security: Enhance Security: Add an Extra Layer of Security to the Login Process
otp_features.offline_access: Offline Access: Generate verification codes without an internet connection.
otp_features.time_based: Timeliness: The verification code automatically updates every 30 seconds to ensure security.
otp_features.widely_supported: Widespread support: compatible with various mainstream authentication applications

step1.title: Step 1: Install the authentication app
step1.description: Install any of the following authentication apps on your phone:

step2.title: Step 2: Scan the QR code
step2.description: Scan the QR code below with your authentication app, or manually enter the key

step3.title: Step 3: Enter the verification code
step3.description: Enter the 6-digit verification code displayed by the authentication app to complete the binding.

account.otp_manual_setup_desc: If you are unable to scan the QR code, please manually enter the following key in your authentication app:

otp_backup_codes.title: Backup recovery code
otp_backup_codes.description: Please save these backup recovery codes, which you can use to log in when you cannot use your authenticator.
otp_backup_codes.warning: Each recovery code can only be used once, please keep it safe.

account.otp_scan_instruction: Please use the authentication app to scan the QR code above.
account.otp_verification_instruction: Please enter the 6-digit verification code displayed by the authentication app.
account.otp_security_description: After successful binding, your account will be protected by two-factor authentication. Please make sure to keep your authentication device safe.
account.otp_step3_description: Enter the verification code to complete the binding
account.otp_step2_description: Scan the QR code with an authentication app
account.select_auth_type: Please select an identity verification method.
account.auth_type_passkey_desc: Authenticate using biometrics or a security key
account.auth_type_otp_desc: Authenticate using a dynamic verification code

assets.name: Name
assets.gateway_tip: Only one of Security Gateway and SSH Gateway can be selected. If both are selected, SSH Gateway will be used.
assets.rdp_drive_path_extra: If not selected, the operator's default storage space will be used
assets.domain_tip: The domain you use to access protected assets, for example: www.example.com, needs to be resolved to the IP address of this system.
assets.entrance_tip: The entrance path is the address that is automatically opened on first access
assets.website_tip: Before using this feature, please ensure that you have enabled the reverse proxy function on the system settings page.
assets.import_asset_tip: When importing assets, either account and password or private key and passphrase can be provided. If both are provided, private key and passphrase will be preferred.
assets.import_asset_error_title: Please check the imported file. The following assets failed to import:
assets.website_entrance: The entrance is the path where users enter the Web Asset.
assets.limit_ip_tip: Restrict users to access assets only from specified IP addresses. Supports CIDR format IP addresses, such as: 192.168.1.0/24. Supports hyphen-separated IP addresses, such as: 192.168.1.0-192.168.1.255. Separate multiple IP addresses with commas.
assets.limit_password_tip: Only the correct password grants access to assets.
assets.response_match_url_tip: Only apply modification when response URL matches (supports regex).
assets.modify_response_tip: You can define multiple modification rules, applied in order.
assets.modify_response_compression_support: Supports automatic decompression and recompression (e.g. gzip, deflate, br).

certificates.is_default_tooltip: The default certificate refers to the certificate used when no other certificates match.
certificates.renew_confirm_content: The certificate will be reapplied and updated. Do you want to continue?
certificates.self_signed_tip_title: Tip: You can replace the root certificate yourself, and the change will take effect after a restart.

stats.no_data_desc: The log will display in real-time during certificate operations.

dns_providers.label: DNS provider
dns_providers.remove_confirm_content: Once removed, it will no longer be possible to apply for a certificate.

assets.dns_provider_config_tip: Please fill in the configuration information according to the supplier's requirements.
assets.public_tip: The restriction only applies to anonymous users.
assets.group_tip: Right-click to edit/delete (except for the Default group)
assets.disable_alive_check_extra: The front-end will periodically send heartbeat packets to maintain an active connection, while the back-end will send requests to the target server and request a response.
assets.preserve_host_tip: It will retain the hostname in the request header as the hostname of the original request, rather than the hostname of the proxy server.
assets.custom_header_tip: Multiple custom request headers can be added, in the format: key: value.
assets.resize_method_extra: A method for updating the RDP server when the client display width or height changes.

resize_methods.display_update_desc: Use the 'Display Update' channel of RDP 8.1 to notify the server that the client display size has changed
resize_methods.reconnect_desc: Automatically disconnect the RDP session when the client display size changes, and reconnect with the new size.

assets.disable_detect_os_extra: When the asset's Logo is empty, the system will automatically identify the type of operating system of the asset and set an appropriate Logo.

wol.mac_addr_placeholder: Please enter the MAC address in the format: AA:BB:CC:DD:EE:FF.
wol.broadcast_placeholder: Please enter the broadcast address, default: 255.255.255.255
wol.wakeup_delay_tooltip: The time to wait for the device to start after sending the wake-up packet

security.mode_extra: The security mode used by RDP connections determines the data encryption method and authentication type.
security.ignore_cert_extra: Ignore the certificate returned by the server, even if the certificate cannot be verified (such as a self-signed certificate).
security.cert_tofu_extra: Enable the "Trust On First Use" (TOFU) policy for FreeRDP, which trusts unknown certificates on the first connection.
security.cert_fingerprints_extra: A list of certificate fingerprints and hash combinations separated by commas, which will be used to verify the server's certificate upon connection.
security.disable_auth_extra: Disable authentication when connecting (does not affect login authentication in Remote Desktop sessions).

modes.any_desc: Automatically select a secure mode based on security protocols supported by the client and server (default)
modes.nla_desc: Using TLS encryption requires providing a username and password in advance.
modes.nla_ext_desc: Same as NLA, but requires the server to send an additional 'early user authorization result'
modes.tls_desc: RDP authentication and encryption through TLS, mainly used for load balancing configuration
modes.vmconnect_desc: Automatically select safe mode, but only for protocols supported by Hyper-V/VMConnect
modes.rdp_desc: Traditional RDP encryption mode, commonly used for older Windows servers

gateways.name: Name
gateways.install_service_admin: Install service (Open CMD with administrator privileges)

load.busy:
Resource紧张" should be translated as "Resource strain" or "Tight resources". However, the most accurate and commonly used translation is:

"Tight resources

ip.trust_placeholder: Press Enter to confirm after input
ip.trust_error: Please enter a valid CIDR format. For example: 192.168.1.0/24

access.max_idle_second: Maximum Idle Time for Terminal Access

security.access_require_mfa: Access to Assets Requires Multi-Factor Authentication

password.too_short: Password length cannot be less than
password.too_simple: Password must contain at least ? types of characters: uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, special characters

login_lock.tip: When enabled, after consecutive login failures within a specified time, the account or IP will be locked. To unlock, please visit

sshd.tip: When enabled, a local port will be listened on, allowing access to authorized SSH assets using an SSH client with the same account and password as this system.

port_forwarding.host_port: Allowed Tunnel Forwarding IP and Port

rp.tip: When enabled, a local port will be listened on, allowing mapping of http/https services to this machine.
rp.system_root_extra: When accessing the reverse proxy website, it needs to verify if the current logged-in user has permission, and will redirect to the system's authorization page. This configuration item is the root URL path of your current login.

mail.tip: You need to enable email service to send test emails.
mail.title: Email Title

ldap.tip: When enabled, LDAP will be used for user authentication.

user_search.size_limit_tooltip: LDAP maximum search results, 0 means no limit.
user_search.filter_tooltip: LDAP user search filter, for example: (objectClass=person).

backup.tip: When recovering data, if there are users with the same login account, the data in the original system will be retained. Additionally, since login passwords are irreversibly encrypted, the recovered account passwords will be randomly generated.

license.func_disabled: This function is not enabled for your current license.

restricted.label: Access restricted
restricted.content: Your license does not support this feature.

license.test_warning: You are currently on a Professional version trial, which expires on

upgrade.title: Upgrade System
upgrade.content: Are you sure you want to upgrade the system version?
upgrade.success_content: Update successful. Do you want to refresh the page now?

wechat_work.tip: After activation, users can scan the QR code with Enterprise WeChat to log in to the system.
wechat_work.corp_id_placeholder: Please enter the Enterprise WeChat Enterprise ID
wechat_work.agent_id_placeholder: Please enter the Enterprise WeChat application ID.
wechat_work.department_placeholder: Please select the user's default department

oidc.tip: After enabling, users can log in to the system using an OIDC identity provider.
oidc.issuer_placeholder: Please enter the Issuer URL of the OIDC identity provider
oidc.client_id_placeholder: Please enter the OIDC client ID.
oidc.scopes_placeholder: Please enter the scope of permissions, multiple ones separated by spaces, such as: openid profile email
oidc.department_placeholder: Please select the user's default department

errors.10003: You cannot operate on your own account
errors.10010: Your IP address is not allowed to log in
errors.10011: Login not allowed at this time
errors.20001: The current system does not match your bound machine code. Please replace it promptly.
errors.20002: Your license has expired. Please renew.
errors.20003: Your online sessions exceed the license limit.
errors.20004: Your user count exceeds the license limit.
errors.20005: Your asset count exceeds the license limit.

websites.group_tip: Drag and drop can adjust the order.
